description: This is the main entry point for a ReactJS web application. It imports React, ReactDOM, global CSS styles, and the main App component, then renders the App component into the DOM element with id 'root' within a React.StrictMode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering React components into a DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the specified React element into the React root.
